constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 68 (Tuesday, April 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GAETZ:
H.R. 2686.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 7
[Page H1999]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 90 Palm Boulevard North in Niceville, Florida, as the "Doolittle Raiders Post Office Building".
